trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a tecla de atalho para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as combinações de teclas de atalho para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: As combinações de teclas de atalho para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve a funcionalidade do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto que descreve a funcionalidade do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome que descreve o elemento associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome que descreve o elemento associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Envia uma solicitação para ativar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>.
